resources.string:
TLDR

Mark the talks you want to see to crowd-avoid talk collisions in time.

Detail

A frontend to halfnarp inspired and using Tobi\'s Halfnarp Client Library

Libraries

- halfnarp client library
- Butterknife
- Otto from Square
- guava
- Android stuff from Google.

Code

You can find the code on GitHub - obey the GPL !-)

One more thing

Please consider not printing your 32C3 ticket but presenting it on some Android device via PassAndroid
